solution.text:
Percentage of marks scored = \(\frac{Marks\, scored}{total \,marks} \times 100\)
Hence, Percentage of marks scored = \(\frac{37}{50} \times 100\)
\( \Rightarrow \) Therefore, Percentage of marks scored= 74 %

content.text: The percentage of marks scored in a test where the score was 37 out of 50.
